mosnterResistances: Damage Resistances bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsterCImmunities: Condition Immunities exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, unconscious
monsterSpecials: Earth Glide. The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.
Siege Monster. The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.
monsterActions: Multiattack. The elemental makes two slam attacks.
Slam. Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
